g.text: Symfony 5 Appointments Lawyers RESTful API. Endpoints exposed to user
Accept citizen as JSON object and insert it in Database
Accept lawyer as JSON object and insert it in Database
Accept citizen/lawyer as JSON object, find it [by email parameter] in Database.
If found - generate X-Auth-Token (uuid), save it in the Database and return X-Auth-Token. Return Status Code: 201
[using X-Auth-Token recieved after login save appointment]
Accept appointment as JSON object and insert it in Database
[using X-Auth-Token recieved after login and appointmentId it from payload update appointment]
Accept appointment as JSON object and update it in Database
[using X-Auth-Token recieved after login and appointmentId it from payload update appointment fields paymentStatus and status]
Accept appointment as JSON object and update it in Database
Successfully updated fields. Return Status Code: 204
[using X-Auth-Token recieved after login and appointmentId it from payload delete appointment]
Accept appointment as JSON object and delete it in Database
Accept X-Auth-Token in headers, find it in Database and delete it.
If X-Auth-Token (uuid) where deleted return Status Code: 204
[output citizens list by page. By 4 citizens on a page]
Find citizens in Database by offset calculated via page number and limit.
Return citizens to User. Return Status Code: 200
[error bad request if nothing was found]
[output lawyers list by page. By 4 lawyers on a page]
Find lawyers in Database by offset calculated via page number and limit.
Return lawyers to User. Return Status Code: 200
[error bad request if nothing was found]
[output appointments list by page. By 4 appointments on a page]
Find appointments in Database by offset calculated via page number and limit.
Return appointments to User. Return Status Code: 200
[error bad request if nothing was found]
